description: This file defines the TvReaderScreen widget, a Flutter page optimized for TV interfaces that allows users to navigate through pages using remote control keys. It handles key inputs such as arrow keys, page keys, and back/escape, and displays a simple paginated view with instructions.

classes.name: TvReaderScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a page with navigation controls optimized for TV remote input.

classes.name: _TvReaderScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the navigation logic, layout, and key bindings for TvReaderScreen.

classes.name: _ReaderStepIntent
classes.description: Custom Intent class used to handle forward/back navigation commands triggered by remote keys.

methods.name: _next
methods.description: Advances to the next page in the page controller, clamping the index between 0 and 9.

methods.name: _prev
methods.description: Returns to the previous page in the page controller, clamping the index between 0 and 9.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree including shortcuts, actions, and UI layout for the TV reader screen.
